short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pins inspiration room images and parses e-commerce product to use on the Pin the Look platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Pin-the-Look extension allows users to "pin" room and product images from anywhere on the Web. These images are saved in folders and used as inspiration for home decor purposes. Product images are used to curate "Look Boards".   

When images are "pinned", this extension automatically collects meta data, such as the page (or product) title, product prices, and source page URLs. This extension does not use or save sensitive user data.
